 Error Message.

Detailed Description

These functions provide functionality for the Battery Charger Advanced Configuration Window which allows fine-grained control of some of the internal timing and algorithm operation.

Function Documentation

BatteryChargerAdvanced::BatteryChargerAdvanced ( AcqUnit *  u,
QWidget *  parent = 0 
) [inherited]

Constructor.

This sets up the various controls with default values either preset or taken from the existing channel if it does exist. An existing channel will be read from the device when the AcqAppConfigUnit object is created.

The Application Information Block has the following entries [0] Channel Type/Number (0x30) [1] Measurement Interval in RTC timer counts (default 32ms). [2] Measurement Averaging Count - index of power of two. [3] Set to TRUE to disable the algorithm in the device [4] Storage Interval in measurement cycles.

Parameters:
u Acquisition Unit Object
parent Parent widget.

Build the User Interface display from Ui object.

Setup the Measurement Averaging Combo Box

Setup the measurement interval spinbox with a default

Setup the result store interval spinbox with a default

void BatteryChargerAdvanced::on_updateButton_clicked (  )  [private, slot, inherited]

Write configuration to the Application IB.

This sends off a block program command to overwrite the configure channel information with that set on the controls.
